alert.note: Alert for Cascade (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 8:25PM MDT until May 05 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Cascade County in central Montana... * Until 900 PM MDT. * At 823 PM MDT, a thunderstorm with severe wind gusts was located 8 miles southwest of Great Falls, moving northeast at 40 mph. Expect wind gusts to 60 mph, brief rain and isolated lightning as this storm passes. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Great Falls, Black Eagle, Ulm, Malmstrom Afb, Sand Coulee, Stockett, Tracy, First Peoples Buffalo Jump State Park and Centerville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
